attributes.action: Say NO to EU emblem on UK Birth, Marriage & Death Certificates
attributes.additional_details:
The European Union want to replace the Royal crest with the EU emblem on all birth, death and marriage certificates within the next 3 years.

As British Citizens our allegiance is to Her Majesty the Queen and the Government must NOT allow the EU to replace the Royal crest on such important legal documents.

Sign this petition to show your support for this important cause.
